mapper.select: SELECT LOT 批号, TO_CHAR(SHENGCHAN_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') 生产日期, TO_CHAR(YOUX_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') 有效期至, NUM 数量, NUM 库存数量, JIANSHU 件数, LINGS_NUM 零散数, NEW_FLAG 新老标识, XIANS_LOC 显示货位, KUC_STATE 库存状态, HUOW_ID 货位内码 FROM (SELECT A.LOT LOT, A.SHENGCHAN_DATE SHENGCHAN_DATE, A.YOUX_DATE YOUX_DATE, NVL((C.NUM - C.CHUKYK_NUM), 0) NUM, fnc_utl_sltojs(A.SHANGP_ID,NVL((C.NUM - C.CHUKYK_NUM), 0)) JIANSHU, fnc_utl_sltolss(A.SHANGP_ID,NVL((C.NUM - C.CHUKYK_NUM), 0)) LINGS_NUM, DECODE(SIGN(ROUND(MONTHS_BETWEEN(YOUX_DATE, SYSDATE) / DECODE(MONTHS_BETWEEN(YOUX_DATE, SHENGCHAN_DATE), 0, 12, MONTHS_BETWEEN(YOUX_DATE, SHENGCHAN_DATE)), 1) / TO_NUMBER(FNC_UTL_GETSYSCS('XPHSX', #{HOUSE_ID})) - 1), -1, '老批号', '新批号') NEW_FLAG, D.XIANS_LOC, C.KUC_STATE, C.HUOW_ID FROM JC_PHWHB A, JC_SPZL B, KC_SPPHHW C, JC_HWZD D WHERE A.SHANGP_ID = B.SHANGP_ID AND A.SHANGP_ID = C.SHANGP_ID AND A.LOT = C.LOT AND C.HUOW_ID = D.HUOW_ID AND B.SHANGP_ID LIKE UPPER(#{SHANGP_ID}) -- AND A.LOT LIKE UPPER('%') AND C.HOUSE_ID = D.HOUSE_ID AND C.HOUSE_ID = #{HOUSE_ID} ${@com.yvan.Sql@phrase('AND', 'A.LOT like')} ORDER BY C.NUM DESC, A.LOT)
mapper.insert: insert into GSP_SPTS (SHANGP_ID, LOT, KUB, XIANS_LOC, huow_id, NUM, RIQI_DATE, CAOZ_STAFF, REMARK, DANJ_NO, HANGHAO, SHENH_FLG, SHENH_STAFF, SHENHYJ, TINSYY, JIECTSYY, DANW_ID, YUAN_NO, HANGHAO_OLD, YEZ_ID, HOUSE_ID, CAOZ_STAFF_ID) values (#{item_id}, #{lot_id}, #{loc_classify}, #{loc_code}, #{loc_id}, #{NUM}, SYSDATE, #{CAOZ_STAFF}, #{REMARK}, #{DANJ_NO}, #{HANGHAO}, '0', '', '', #{TINSYY}, '', #{customer_id}, '', '', #{owner_id}, #{HOUSE_ID}, #{CAOZ_STAFF_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT CANSZ FROM SYS_CS WHERE CANS_NO=#{CANS_NO} AND HOUSE_ID=#{HOUSE_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into KCGL_KCZTBH_HZ (DANJ_NO, RIQI_DATE, CAOZ_STAFF, ZHIJ_STAFF, KUC_STATE_BH,HOUSE_ID) values (#{DANJ_NO}, SYSDATE, #{CAOZ_STAFF}, #{ZHIJ_STAFF}, #{KUC_STATE_BH},#{HOUSE_ID})

insert into KCGL_KCZTBH_MX (DANJ_NO, HANGHAO, SHANGP_ID, LOT, YUANYIN, CHUL_OPIN, NUM, HUOW_ID, KUCSL_COND, LOCK_FLG) values (#{DANJ_NO}, #{HANGHAO}, #{SHANGP_ID}, #{LOT}, #{YUANYIN}, #{CHUL_OPIN}, #{NUM}, #{HUOW_ID}, '0', 'N')
